rows.label: qev050902_MSG0001
rows.name: Halt! Who goes there?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0002
rows.name: ...Gu Ladha? And a human?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0003
rows.name:
I suppose that is not so uncommon a sight.
What is your business here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0004
rows.name:
I apologize for the unannounced visit accompanied by
an outsider, sir. I come to you with a humble request.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0005
rows.name:
Hmm. It's unusual to see you taking the initiative.
I would hear this request.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0006
rows.name: I come today to request a reassignment, sir![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0007
rows.name: Oh? To what?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0008
rows.name:
To serve as a liaison between the Wrothians and
humans, sir.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0009
rows.name:
...In other words, you wish to be removed from the
field of battle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0010
rows.name: Sir? N-no, sir! That is not my intent![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0011
rows.name:
Do not lie to me, Gu Ladha!
This proposal reeks of cowardice and excuses.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0012
rows.name: Did you truly think I would accept such a thing?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0013
rows.name: Sir, you misunderstand! I am merely trying toâ€”[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0014
rows.name:
And you have dragged this human here for...what?
To serve as a prop in your craven scheme?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0015
rows.name:
This person understands my situation, sir.
The request for reassignment stems from [ST:gender p1=his p2=her ] own
suggestion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0016
rows.name: A comrade of yours, then? I see...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0017
rows.name: And how trustworthy is this comrade?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0018
rows.name: I will require a show of [ST:gender p1=his p2=her ] capability and sincerity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0019
rows.name:
If [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] can prove [ST:gender p1=his p2=her ] skill as a warrior and complete my
request, I shall extend my trust.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0020
rows.name: But only then will I consider your reassignment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0021
rows.name: And your request, sir?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0022
rows.name: A simple matter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0023
rows.name:
Two bloodied faces, three tempered blade modules,
and an advanced core. Bring to me the correct number
of those three parts, and I shall be satisfied.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0024
rows.name: Is...that all, sir?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0025
rows.name: That is all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0026
rows.name:
Kind BLADE, you must find the bloodied faces,
tempered blade modules, and advanced core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0027
rows.name: Will you do this for Gu Ladha?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0028
rows.name:
I require an advanced core, two bloodied faces, and
three tempered blade modules. ...More an errand of
convenience than a test, but I trust you do not mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0029
rows.name:
I expect you did not come here expecting to be put
to work, and for this, you have my apologies.
Still, I hope you will do this for Gu Ladha.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0030
rows.name:
Perhaps she has been waiting to meet friends like you
all this while.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050902_MSG0031
rows.name: Someone to give her that push forward.[ST:wait ]
